com.p6spy.engine.spy.option

Interface OptionChangePropagator

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DelayedOptionChangePropagator
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DelayedOptionChangePropagatorImpl, NonPropagatingDelayedOptionChangePropagator

    public interface OptionChangePropagator
    Option change propagator with support for delayed option changes propagation.
    Author:
    peterb

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void fireOptionChanged(String key, Object oldValue, Object newValue)
      Fires options changed propagation.
      void registerOptionChangedListener(OptionChangeListener listener)
      Registers OptionChangeListener for the option change notifications.
      void unregisterOptionChangedListener(OptionChangeListener listener)
      Unregisters OptionChangeListener from the option change notifications.

    • Method Detail

      • fireOptionChanged

        void fireOptionChanged(String key,
                     Object oldValue,
                     Object newValue)
        Fires options changed propagation.
        Parameters:
        key - the name of the option
        oldValue - the old value of the option
        newValue - the new value of the option

        Registers OptionChangeListener for the option change notifications.

        void unregisterOptionChangedListener(OptionChangeListener listener)
        Unregisters OptionChangeListener from the option change notifications.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to unregister
